title: The Coolest Kids’ Bike Is Made in a Wonderbread Truck | MADE Show
content:
Last year Monē Bikes showed a prototype Minnē but this year it’s ready for sale as a “disc brake single speed… and it rips!”

Read the full article at The Coolest Kids’ Bike Is Made in a Wonderbread Truck | MADE Show on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
